value:
$WmMPID_ローロー,ch01_25_Roro_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Uwee hee hee! Alls according to plan.
We allses wait here, then surround
thems. An ambush! $k$pLegion always gets the jobses done.
A quick stab in the backses and...$k$pBye-bye, $Nu!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|They're not here... Perhaps they
escaped! Let's go a bit further, and
see if we can find them...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Yes, let's! There's no time to waste.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Sharena... Wait a moment.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Is something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I'm afraid so. She just led us into an
ambush! What's next?$k$pI don't have hard proof, of course...
But I suspect she isn't being honest
with you, Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Alfonse! How could you say that?
Once she was freed, we became
friends. It's only natural!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Sharena, please...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I won't hear any more of this. I stand
by my friends. I simply can't believe
that Katarina would stoop so low.$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$Sbs150|
